lead_paragraph: A.R. Gurney’s play “Office Hours” makes a gentle plea for the enduring worth of Homer, Dante, Shakespeare and other dead white males as writers whose works illuminate human problems.
snippet: A.R. Gurney’s play “Office Hours” makes a gentle plea for the enduring worth of Homer, Dante, Shakespeare and other dead white males as writers whose works illuminate human problems.

headline.main: A Case for the Classics, Chapter by Chapter
headline.seo: A.R. Gurney’s Play at the Flea Takes On Literature
